description_for_human: Real-time Solana (SOL) trading data from OKX exchange with comprehensive multi-timeframe candlestick analysis, order book depth, and WebSocket streaming for professional crypto analysis.
description_for_model: Access comprehensive SOL-USDT trading data including real-time prices, 7-timeframe candlestick charts (5m, 15m, 30m, 1H, 4H, 1D, 1W), 50-level order book depth, recent trades, market metrics, and system health. Perfect for crypto analysis, trading decisions, and market monitoring.
